name: CodePipelinePipelineStagesActions
description: Actions is a property of the AWS CodePipeline Pipeline Stages property that specifies an action for an AWS CodePipeline stage.

properties.name: ActionTypeId
properties.description: Specifies the action type and the provider of the action.
properties.typeDescription: AWS CodePipeline Pipeline Stages Actions ActionTypeId

properties.name: Configuration
properties.description: The action's configuration. These are key-value pairs that specify input values for an action.

properties.name: InputArtifacts
properties.description: The name or ID of the artifact that the action consumes, such as a test or build artifact.
properties.typeDescription: List of AWS CodePipeline Pipeline Stages Actions InputArtifacts

properties.name: OutputArtifacts
properties.description: The artifact name or ID that is a result of the action, such as a test or build artifact.
properties.typeDescription: List of AWS CodePipeline Pipeline Stages Actions OutputArtifacts

properties.name: RoleArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a service role that the action uses. The pipeline's role assumes this role.

properties.name: RunOrder
properties.description: The order in which AWS CodePipeline runs this action.
